fields.name: Deprecated
fields.description: Optional. True if the plan is deprecated. If there are replacing plans they will appear in `replacedBy` property

fields.name: FreeTrialRemainingTime
fields.description: The duration left for the subscriptions free trial period - in ISO 8601 format (e.g. P3Y6M4DT12H30M5S).

fields.name: PricingTier
fields.description: The pricing tier value. Microsoft Defender for Cloud is provided in two pricing tiers: free and standard, with the standard tier available with a trial period. The standard tier offers advanced security capabilities, while the free tier offers basic security features.

fields.name: ReplacedBy
fields.description: Optional. List of plans that replace this plan. This property exists only if this plan is deprecated.

fields.name: SubPlan
fields.description: The sub-plan selected for a Standard pricing configuration, when more than one sub-plan is available. Each sub-plan enables a set of security features. When not specified, full plan is applied.
